mapper.select: select s.id, s.name, s.sex, s.email, s.class_id, c.college, c.major from student s join class c on s.class_id = c.id
select s.id, s.name, s.sex, s.email, s.class_id, c.college, c.major from student s join class c on s.class_id = c.id where s.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update student set name=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, email=#{email}, class_id=#{classId} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select s.id, s.name, g.point from student s,grade g where g.course_id = #{id} and s.id = g.student_id
select s.id, s.name, s.sex, s.email, s.class_id, c.college, c.major from student s join class c on s.class_id = c.id
select s.id, s.name, s.sex, s.email, s.class_id, c.college, c.major from student s join class c on s.class_id = c.id where c.college = #{college}
